select signin_id,order_no,p_name,img_name,p_sale,p_count,pqd from order_info join (select tt1.p_count, tt1.cost, tt1.order_info_order_no, tt1.product_p_no, tt2.* from order_product as tt1 INNER JOIN product as tt2 ON tt1.product_p_no = tt2.p_no) as t1 on order_no = t1.order_info_order_no where signin_id= #{id}

select order_no,pqd,sale,p_name from product join (select * from order_info join order_product on order_info.order_no = order_product.order_info_order_no)tt1 on tt1.product_p_no = product.p_no where signin_id = #{id}
select all_no, all_content, name, pqd from all_question Inner join signin on signin_id = signin.id where signin_id = #{id}
select p_no, p_content, name, pqd from p_question Inner join signin on signin_id = signin.id where signin_id = #{id}
